column2: CSH: Show Artifact Filters
Show the §Yartifact filter decisions§!, so that you can restrict your searches to the particular types of artifacts you are looking for.
CSH: Hide Artifact Filters
Hide the §Yartifact filter decisions§!\n\nNB: Any artifact filters that are enabled will §Yremain enabled§! even though the decisions are hidden!
CSH Filter: Toggle All Filters
CSH Filter: Toggle 'Only Unowned Artifacts' Filter
CSH Filter: Toggle 'No Armor' Filter
CSH Filter: Toggle 'No Books' Filter
CSH Filter: Toggle 'No Clutter' Filter
CSH Filter: Toggle 'No Mounts and Pets' Filter
CSH Filter: Toggle 'No Necklaces' Filter
CSH Filter: Toggle 'No Rings' Filter
CSH Filter: Toggle 'No Weapons' Filter
CSH Filter: Toggle 'No Other' Filter
§YAll artifact filters§! will be §Rdisabled§!.\n\n§YAll artifacts§! will be §Gincluded§! in search results.

§YAll artifact filters§! will be §Renabled§!.

§YAll artifacts§! will be §Gexcluded§! from search results.

(This isn't very useful on its own - you'll probably want to disable at least one of the other filters...)
The §Y"Only Unowned"§! filter (currently §Yenabled§!) will be §Rdisabled§!.\n\nArtifacts of types that are §Yowned by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be §Gincluded§! in search results.
The §Y"Only Unowned"§! filter (currently §Ydisabled§!) will be §Genabled§!.\n\nArtifacts of types that are §Yowned by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be §Rexcluded§! from search results.
The §Y"No Armor"§! filter (currently §Yenabled§!) will be §Rdisabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that are §Yclassed as armor§! will be §Gincluded§! in search results.
The §Y"No Armor"§! filter (currently §Ydisabled§!) will be §Genabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that are §Yclassed as armor§! will be §Rexcluded§! from search results.
The §Y"No Books"§! filter (currently §Yenabled§!) will be §Rdisabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that are §Yclassed as books§! will be §Gincluded§! in search results.
The §Y"No Books"§! filter (currently §Ydisabled§!) will be §Genabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that are §Yclassed as books§! will be §Rexcluded§! from search results.
The §Y"No Clutter"§! filter (currently §Yenabled§!) will be §Rdisabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that are §Yclassed as clutter§! will be §Gincluded§! in search results.
The §Y"No Clutter"§! filter (currently §Ydisabled§!) will be §Genabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that are §Yclassed as clutter§! will be §Rexcluded§! from search results.
The §Y"No Mounts Or Pets"§! filter (currently §Yenabled§!) will be §Rdisabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that are §Yclassed as mounts or pets§! will be §Gincluded§! in search results.
The §Y"No Mounts Or Pets"§! filter (currently §Ydisabled§!) will be §Genabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that are §Yclassed as mounts or pets§! will be §Rexcluded§! from search results.
The §Y"No Necklaces"§! filter (currently §Yenabled§!) will be §Rdisabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that are §Yclassed as necklaces§! will be §Gincluded§! in search results.
The §Y"No Necklaces"§! filter (currently §Ydisabled§!) will be §Genabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that are §Yclassed as necklaces§! will be §Rexcluded§! from search results.
The §Y"No Rings"§! filter (currently §Yenabled§!) will be §Rdisabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that are §Yclassed as rings§! will be §Gincluded§! in search results.
The §Y"No Rings"§! filter (currently §Ydisabled§!) will be §Genabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that are §Yclassed as rings§! will be §Rexcluded§! from search results.
The §Y"No Weapons"§! filter (currently §Yenabled§!) will be §Rdisabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that are §Yclassed as weapons§! will be §Gincluded§! in search results.
The §Y"No Weapons"§! filter (currently §Ydisabled§!) will be §Genabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that are §Yclassed as weapons§! will be §Rexcluded§! from search results.
The §Y"No Other"§! filter (currently §Yenabled§!) will be §Rdisabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that §Yare not part of any of the other classes§! will be §Gincluded§! in search results.
The §Y"No Other"§! filter (currently §Ydisabled§!) will be §Genabled§!.\n\nArtifacts that §Yare not part of any of the other classes§! will be §Rexcluded§! from search results.

§g.§!
NB:
Artifact filters §Yonly§! affect the §Y"CSH-Q"§! traits.
§Y"CSH-MaxQ"§! traits are §Rnot impacted by filters§!, due to processing constraints.
